review: We really like this little device.  It is a pain you have to have it plugged in but I see now it must be so.  I am sure the format will improve over time but for us right now it is great.  We can 'throw' the youtube on the screen from the laptop.  We can easily find movies, youtube channels and more.  I got a smokin' deal with prime before they made them available and I am so glad I did.  No need for dish or cable now.  It does everything we need it to.
